creator: 3c
descriptionHtml:
Simple usage manager to check and limit how you use your apps. Perfect tool for parents and kids wishing to control their app usage.

★ Top apps used
★ Today's and this month usage
★ Monthly usage for each app.
★ Day of the week average usage for each app.

★ Limit app usage per day, per month or per day of the week. Requires either root or the use of 3C Companion (https://3c71.com/3cc)

My son asked for it! So I built it.
descriptionShort: Manage how you use your app

appDetails.developerAddress:
721 Av Général de Gaulle
06700 Saint Laurent du Var
FRANCE
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Because of very low support (dropped 70% in 3 months), ads are back (unless previously removed)
